author: Unreal Engine
description:
Event Info: Join us for an exciting session where we’ll dive deep into the latest Fortnite Creative and Unreal Editor for Fortnite updates, celebrate our amazing community, and give you the inside scoop on new features that will change the way you create. Expect engaging walkthroughs, pro tips, and live interactions with our development team—all designed to level up your creative process.

This stream, we'll be chatting all about Squid Game tools and more:
- Overview of Squid Game Tools
- World Content
- Templates
- New Gameplay / New Genre
title: Creating In Fortnite I Squid Game Tools

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Get ready to gather all your Q’s about how we develop UEFN at Epic Games! (Think anything from how tools are made to how they're prioritized to handling bugs. Anything involving tool development is game!)

This Thursday, Rubique joins us live to talk through your questions about developing UEFN with special guests! Epic Games team members Andrew Grant and Jay Villanueva will dig into the details and answer questions submitted by the community.
title: Let's Chat UEFN Development w/ Rubique

author: Unreal Engine
description: Come for an engaging chat with Joel Zimmerman—the legendary producer, musician, and DJ known as deadmau5—about the intersection of real-time audio, music, and graphics rendering with Unreal Engine 5. Zimmerman recently released Meowingtons Simulator for PC, a ragdoll dancing simulator, under his Oberha5li Studios banner. Join Epic Games Director of Unreal Engine Audio Aaron McLeran and Senior Audio Programmer Max Hayes, along with moderator Miles Perkins, Director of Client and Industry Relations for Media and Entertainment.
title: Real-Time Audiovisual Mechanics: An Epic Chat with deadmau5 | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Gaming, Automotive, Media & Entertainment, Architecture and the celebration of all things Unreal Engine!

Find out how Unreal Engine is pushing it all forward at Stockholmsmässan from September 22 - 24: https://epic.gm/unreal-fest-stockholm
title: In one month's time we'll be kicking off the party at Unreal Fest Stockholm 🎉

author: Unreal Engine
description:
This presentation delves into how Quixel's asset processing pipeline has evolved over time to provide the optimum experience of utilizing photogrammetry-based assets in real-time use cases for UE/UEFN. Pipeline engineers discuss the custom tools and processes developed to achieve this, along with best practices for setting up a Quixel Megascans asset for best quality and performance.

The session also dives into the performance and quality improvements made to Megascans assets for Fab. This includes a comprehensive overview of the efforts to overhaul the LOD chain into structured tiers, calibrate texture maps for plug-and-play usability, and optimize topology to maximize the efficiency of real-time budgets.
title: Megascans 3D Asset Processing | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
